metadata.Title: CVE-2020-13341 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions prior to13.2.10, 13.3.7 and 13.4.2. Insufficient permission check allows attackerwith developer role to perform various deletions.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
